plot: Archie joins the wrestling team to get closer to Hiram; Jughead digs up shocking details about Riverdale's past; Betty unearths some dark secrets about Chic.

Jughead learns some shocking details about Riverdale's history and uses an interview with Toni's grandfather, the oldest living Serpent, to write a wrong. Archie tries out for the Riverdale High wrestling team in an effort to get in Hiram's good graces. Betty learns secrets about her brother as she discovers they may have something in common. Veronica and Josie clash as they prepare for their Picken's Day performance.—snowflakeaudrey
